biotools.summary: Tools for Motif Discovery (MoD) in nucleotide sequences that includes: Weeder, a program for detecting transcription factor binding sites (TFBS) in coregulated genes, WeederH, a tool for detecting TFBS and regulatory regions from homologous genes, and RNA profile, a tool for secondary structure motif discovery in RNA sequences.

bioschemas.name: MoD Tools
